Description: Ostracon, rim-fragment of a pale red-orange pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of four lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393985) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393985)
